page.title: 17Mr. Blackman & the Dinosaur
page.content:
Every year in Medstead school we have a school fete and about ten minutes after it starts a big dinosaur comes in to the school. It goes round the school field giving people rides. The dinosaur is orange with black spots. Sometimes you have to guess the dinosaur's name or just have a go on him. The most people that can go on him is 15. Mr Blackman drives the dinosaur.
When the school had a Traction Engine Rally the dinosaur came and let people ride on him but the space was smaller so the ride was shorter. the dinosaur is a combine harvester with the blades taken off and covered with fibreglass and painted orange with black spots. When it drives along the people cant't believe their eyes.
